name: TC-09 | Verify that clicking the 'الأدوات' button scrolls the page to the 'الأدوات' section on the current page.
description:
Test Objective: verify the 'أدوات المنصة' Card navigates to the section correctly
Step:
1) Navigate to the website URL. (handled in BaseTest).
2) Click on 'أدوات المنصة' Card.
3) Observe the page scrolling behavior.
Expected Result: 'أدوات المنصة' card should scroll the page to the 'أدوات المنصة' section.
The 'أدوات المنصة' section should be fully visible and all content should be displayed correctly.

steps.name: 🧭 Scrolled to element: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (7990eab4713538e05a320ea6bd8f17a0)] -> xpath: //p-card[contains(@class, 'theme-card') and contains(@class, 'cursor-pointer')][.//h5[normalize-space()='الأدوات']]]
✅ Clicked on element: By.xpath: //p-card[contains(@class, 'theme-card') and contains(@class, 'cursor-pointer')][.//h5[normalize-space()='الأدوات']]
Section 'أدوات المنصة' is visible in the viewport
